doc.title: Xyz'd
doc.plot: This ABC Family TV special aired just weeks after the wrap of the hit reality TV show "All-American Girl." It gave America a behind-the-scenes glimpses into the lives of the show's contestants both on and off set. During the multi-hour marathon, performers such as Top-Ten Finalist, Tarah Paige, and winner, Jessica Felice, were interviewed as to their experience on the show, preparation for the show, and future plans for their careers.
